"We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision-making for a long time," Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google. By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead, and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.
